The video seemed watchable but the audio was so rough that I didn't make it past the first few seconds. I could be mistaken and the audio is dubbed over late but I didn't want to get into the story only to learn the audio never improved.

Thanks very much for uploading this. I've been looking for it ever since it first hit theaters. A lot of other sites have fake torrents of this movie. Downloaded, watched, 100% genuine movie. And yes the audio is not great but it's a cam, and despite what the commenter above says, this is entirely watchable.

I read about the audio being poor but I have absolutely no trouble with the audio on VLC. Great up! Thanks TvTeam!
